title: Biden Taps Former Obama Economist to Be Treasury’s Top Diplomat
sub_head: Jay Shambaugh could have role in setting sanctions, work with IMF
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden nominated Jay Shambaugh, a professor at George Washington University and former economic aide in the Obama administration, to serve as the Treasury Department’s top economic diplomat.
If confirmed by the 50-50 Senate to be the undersecretary for international affairs, Mr. Shambaugh would help lead the Biden administration’s approach to international finance and trade, as well as its work with the World Bank and International Monetary Fund.
